ygData.subject: Thanks Gaelthorne!
ygData.msgSnippet: Had a good run last night.  I m in North Karana waiting for my Druid Guildmate who s gonna teleport me to Butcherblock - so I can cash in the Brazen Brass
ygData.messageBody:
Had a good run last night. I'm in North Karana waiting for my Druid Guildmate who's gonna teleport me to Butcherblock - so I can cash in the Brazen Brass Kilij Plans for the weapon (finally got it over the weekend!). I hear someone doing a shout - "Fenne charm for the looting at loc..." I grab my drum and high-tail it - and boom I get it!

I go to Butcherblock -> Felwithe (pick up gold bars) -> Kelethin - get the bars enchanted and get the Kilij. Get teleported to West Commons - and start killing some Shadowmen. I hear an auction "Lambent Stone for Sale". I offer 20pp (all I had on me - and fair price anywhere) - so Gaelthorne says - "Meet me at the Druid ring". I get there and he says "Hey, are you Slyde from the EQ-Bards list?" I say yes - so he says "Well you can have the stone for free then"

I thank him, we chat for a bit - and go on our ways. All I can say is "One class act!"

Thanks Gaelthorne - I'm a Dark Boned Bracelet away from my first piece of Lambent!

Slyde - 28 of Xegony
